page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: Brands Hatch Place Country Club is a Georgian house built in l806 by the Duke of Norfolk as a country cottage. It is surrounded by l2 acres of wood- land & garden.Meetings,conferences, lunches & dinners, wedding receptions & guests are catered for with l4 bed- rooms for residents.Facilities are available to residents & non-residents. The conference room accommodates 45 delegates.Private parties can be arranged for 6-l50 people.The restua- rant caters for 90 sitting down or l50 buffet sytle & offers freshly prepared & cooked food.Excellent wines are available."Fredericks" the leisure com- plex next door is available to guests. The hotel employs l0 permanent staff plus part-time staff.The day we called to meet the manager the hotel was fully booked with Americans attending the Sandwich Open Golf Tournament.
